Sign coin spends to create a valid spend bundle for a transaction.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  title={"Body"}

</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response from sign_coin_spends","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Response with signed spend bundle","required":["spend_bundle"],"properties":{"spend_bundle":{"description":"Signed spend bundle","type":"object","required":["coin_spends","aggregated_signature"],"properties":{"aggregated_signature":{"type":"string"},"coin_spends":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","required":["coin","puzzle_reveal","solution"],"properties":{"coin":{"type":"object","required":["parent_coin_info","puzzle_hash","amount"],"properties":{"amount":{"oneOf":[{"type":"string"},{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0}],"title":"Amount"},"parent_coin_info":{"type":"string"},"puzzle_hash":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CoinJson"},"puzzle_reveal":{"type":"string"},"solution":{"type":"string"}},"title":"CoinSpendJson"}}},"title":"SpendBundleJson"}},"title":"SignCoinSpendsResponse"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid parameters or malformed JSON"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized - no wallet is currently logged in, or authentication is required"},"404":{"description":"Not found - requested resource doesn't exist (e.g., NFT, offer, transaction)"},"500":{"description":"Internal server error - unexpected failure in wallet operations"}}}
